data.name: The Strange Story Of Brian Fisher: Chapter 2
data.detailed_description:
After escaping from the old cabin, and falling down without consciousness, Brian Fisher traveled in time and space. He woke up 30 years ago, when he was a little boy, in a place that he doesn't remember where it is, and how he got there.

Even everything seems to be natural in that place, he is stuck in another dimension in time and space. Can you help him discover why he was sent there and how he can back to the present time?

NOTE: The game is a type of "ESCAPE ROOM". Every "New Game" items are randomly positioned and combination for puzzles are randomly generated.

data.short_description: After escaping from the old cabin, and falling down without consciousness, Brian Fisher traveled in time and space. He woke up 30 years ago, when he was a little boy, in a place that he doesn't remember where it is, and how he got there.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5, Ryzen 1300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 950 / ATI Radeon RX460, 2G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7, Ryzen 1600X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 / AMD RX570, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
